message.content:
1. Pain was evaluated.
2. The evaluation used the verbal pain rating score (VRS).
3. The evaluation was done preoperatively.
4. The preoperative evaluation included pain at rest.
5. The preoperative evaluation included pain on movement of the knee joint.
6. The evaluation was also done postoperatively.
7. The postoperative evaluation was done at 0 hours.
8. The postoperative evaluation was done at 1 hour.
9. The postoperative evaluation was done at 2 hours.
10. The postoperative evaluation was done at 3 hours.
11. The postoperative evaluation was done at 4 hours.
12. The postoperative evaluation was done at 6 hours.
13. The postoperative evaluation was done at 12 hours.
14. The postoperative evaluation was done at 24 hours.

messages.content:
Statement: Pain was evaluated by means of the verbal pain rating score (VRS) preoperatively (at rest and on movement of the knee joint) and postoperatively at 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 12 and 24 hours.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
